page.title: 02LONELY LETWELL
page.content: In{Letwell}there are no shops apart from a small post office. Many houses can not have automatic washers because it is impossible for the water to be pumped up hill for most houses in { {Letwell}are partly underground because they are so old.Many children go on the school bus for it is quite a way to their school.But those are Letwells disadvantages. Letwell also has many advantages like it being peaceful and lonely.Many children play on the road for hardly any traffic apart from the occasional tractor uses the road. People in Letwell without a car are stranded but everyone in Letwell says that they would not swap Letwell for anywhere else in the world for they have come to love both its advantages and its disadvantages.In Letwell there is a{Norman church}and the only {octagonal dovecote}in England.
